cohortName: Malignant tumor of esophagus referent incident cohort
logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (4181343) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

cohortName: Malignant tumor of esophagus referent prevalent cohort
logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (4181343) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history, with at least 365 days of prior continuous observation. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.
